deleteRoom.areYouSureText: If you press 'Yes', you will permanently delete this room.
deleteRoom.thereArePlantsInRoomText:
There are plants in the chosen room.
Remove the plants from the room and you will be able to delete the room.

deletePlant.areYouSureText: If you press 'Yes', you will permanently delete this plant.
